About the team Product Verification team at Kinaxis enables reliable testing and delivery of solutions developed by the entire R&D at Kinaxis. Our main goal is to put together the entire stack by automatically deploying all software components and running the automated tests. We control the largest and the most complicated deployment & testing frameworks in R&D. We operate in both privately maintained data center and in the public Cloud. In addition, we maintain and enhance automation for releasing the main Kinaxis products. The uniqueness of the team is that it is the only team within R&D that automates the deployment of entire software solutions, hence we collaborate with all development teams and work with a variety of tooling. This is a full-time, 12-month position, starting September 2025. To be eligible for a Co-op or Intern position at Kinaxis, you must either be currently enrolled in full-time education or, if you are a recent/upcoming graduate, your graduation date must be within 12 months of the placement end date.
